com.lambdaworks.redis

Interface RedisHLLConnection<K,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - Key type.
    V - Value type.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RedisAdvancedClusterCommands<K,V>, RedisAdvancedClusterConnection<K,V>, RedisClusterCommands<K,V>, RedisClusterConnection<K,V>, RedisCommands<K,V>, RedisConnection<K,V>, RedisPubSubCommands<K,V>
    Deprecated. 
    Use RedisHLLCommands

    @Deprecated
public interface RedisHLLConnection<K,V>
    Synchronous executed commands for HyperLogLog (PF* commands).
    Since:
    3.0
    Author:
    Mark Paluch

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Long pfadd(K key, V value, V... moreValues)
      Deprecated. 
      Adds the specified elements to the specified HyperLogLog.
      Long pfcount(K key, K... moreKeys)
      Deprecated. 
      Return the approximated cardinality of the set(s) observed by the HyperLogLog at key(s).
      String pfmerge(K destkey, K sourcekey, K... moreSourceKeys)
      Deprecated. 
      Merge N different HyperLogLogs into a single one.

    • Method Detail

      • pfadd

        Long pfadd(K key,
           V value,
           V... moreValues)
        Deprecated. 
        Adds the specified elements to the specified HyperLogLog.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        value - the value
        moreValues - more values
        Returns:
        Long integer-reply specifically: 1 if at least 1 HyperLogLog internal register was altered. 0 otherwise.

      • pfmerge

        String pfmerge(K destkey,
               K sourcekey,
               K... moreSourceKeys)
        Deprecated. 
        Merge N different HyperLogLogs into a single one.
        Parameters:
        destkey - the destination key
        sourcekey - the source key
        moreSourceKeys - more source keys
        Returns:
        Long simple-string-reply The command just returns OK.

      • pfcount

        Long pfcount(K key,
             K... moreKeys)
        Deprecated. 
        Return the approximated cardinality of the set(s) observed by the HyperLogLog at key(s).
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        moreKeys - more keys
        Returns:
        Long integer-reply specifically: The approximated number of unique elements observed via PFADD.
